name: contract-catalog
description: A catalog of contracts for APIs, events and data contracts using OpenAPI, AsyncAPI and JSON Schema

scripts.generate:enhanced: npm run build && node dist/index.js && npm run generate:datacontract
scripts.generate:datacontract: bash -c 'if command -v datacontract &> /dev/null; then echo "Generating enhanced data contract documentation with datacontract-cli..." && datacontract catalog --files "contracts/**/*.yaml" --output output/datacontract-catalog && echo "Enhanced catalog generated at output/datacontract-catalog"; else echo "datacontract-cli not found. Install with: pip install -r requirements.txt"; fi'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run generate && npm run serve
scripts.dev:enhanced: npm run build && npm run generate:enhanced && npm run serve
